Name: afmformats
Description: Python library for reading common AFM file formats

Name: AutoSmarTrace
Description: For automated tracing of chains in AFM images or any bright chain-like objects on dark background with or without noise.

Name: nanite
Description: Fitting and machine-learning based rating of AFM force-indentation data

Name: PyJibe
Description: GUI for AFM data analysis with an emphasis on biological specimens

Name: SmarTrace
Description: Chain tracing program developed to extract persistence lengths from AFM images of filaments such as collagen and DNA. Can be used on any type of image with bright chain-like structures on a darker background.
